SEARCH
Package apron

Class Texpr1CstNode

java.lang.Object
apron.Texpr1Node
apron.Texpr1CstNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable
public class Texpr1CstNode extends Texpr1Node implements Cloneable, Serializable
Class of constant leaves in Texpr1Node level 1 expression trees.

A constant value is represented by a Coeff object.

See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    • substitute

      public Texpr1Node substitute(Var var, Texpr1Node t)
      Description copied from class: Texpr1Node
      Substitutes all occurrences of the variable var with the tree t.

      this is modified in-place.

      As some nodes can change their kind (a node for a variable var becomes the root of the tree t), a new root node is returned.

      Specified by:
      substitute in class Texpr1Node
